channel.title: Endacia Craft - The One Server You Can Keep <3
channel.description:
[i]You remember that one server you just can't leave? You can't forget? That's us. Welcome to Endacia Craft.[/i]
Endacia Craft is a building server. No monsters, no animals, you can build what you want, when you want without being bothered by a spider or a creeper, and with active people and friendly mods, how could you say no?
Don't worry about your house being destroyed, it can all be protected. Want to make a town? Add more people to the protection!
Admin/Mod not online? We have LWC!
Tired of just plain redstone but don't like dozens of new features you can't keep up with? We've covered that too ;)
Now, this is a new server on a fresh landscape, but I believe I finally found that ONE seed that has JUST the right amount of mountains, flatland, islands, and water.
Commands/Rules/Plugins all stated in spawn.
Hope to see you on online! [b]IP: 50.99.226.158[/b]
